ygData.subject: Re: Magic Arrows and Bows
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m not gonna say where i ve been getting them, but I am stockpiling the arrows of poison i ve been getting as loot off a certain mob.  They are quite a
ygData.messageBody:
> Another thought I had was what if we could have our arrows do
> something useful other than just pull monsters. What if we could make
> an arrow that also poisoned the monster, diseased it, or something to
> that effect. I think thats something we should all look into.

I'm not gonna say where i've been getting them, but I am stockpiling the
arrows of poison i've been getting as loot off a certain mob. They are
quite a nice arrow.. I have 74 as of today. Too bad i'm a cleric.
Whenever i get 100 they're going to a guild buddy.
